item.title: SLB
item.description: score:104 Chances: The average brokerage recommendation for Schlumberger (SLB) is equivalent to a Buy. The outlook for corporate earnings continues to be solid, as recent Q4 2023 results revealed companies beat market expectations with concrete results. Elite blue-chip stocks like Schlumberger can provide downside protection and offer substantial upside in a year full of uncertainties.
